channel.title: 'Buy 10' problem. FormationX source
channel.description: Does anyone know how to fix the "buy 10" option on a FormationX source? For some reason it seems to buy 70? I've looked through google for about 30+ minutes and haven't been successful.

item.title: 'Buy 10' problem. FormationX source
item.dc:creator: @Dario14 Dario14
item.description:
@Dario14 wrote:

BankAll.java i believe, should look something like this

case 3900: c.getShops().buyItem(removeId, removeSlot, 70); break;
change 70 to whatever you want. 70 being the number of items bought.

Read full topic
